LanguageData.ThreshingHusk.label: Threshing husk
LanguageData.ThreshingHusk.description: Threshing is the process of loosening the edible part of rice (Brown rice) from the husks and straw to which it is attached. Brown rice can be converted into White rice via polishing.
LanguageData.RiceProcessing.label: Polish rice
LanguageData.RiceProcessing.description: To polish rice, remove rice bran from Brown rice to make it into White rice.
